pageContent: Introduction: Men with advanced prostate cancer (APC) undergoing androgen deprivation therapy (ADT) often experience distressing sexual side effects. Sexual bother is an important component of adjustment. Factors associated with increased bother are not well understood.

metaData.source:
Review article: high intensity focused ultrasound--potential for cancer treatment
https://pubmed.ncbi.nlm.nih.gov/8777589/
